book:
Documentation section for informations about project, installation, etc. This site is the only source of informations/documentation for V-Q (well, at this time, may be some day someone will write some nice guide :-).
Developers sections includes: authors, history of repository, source code documentation. SourceForge section includes links to: forums, mailing lists and tracker (where you can report bugs, modification requests).
